tool_description: Get all company names within the GaiaLens Dataset.

api_list.name: getCompanyNames
api_list.description: This API returns a list of all company names available to the user. It can be used as a pre-step before invoking other GaiaLens APIs such as GaiaLens ESG Scores, GaiaLens Historical ESG Scores, and GaiaLens ESG News.
